official_title: To redesignate the National Fish and Wildlife Forensics Laboratory located in Ashland, Oregaon, as the "Clark R. Bavin National Fish and Wildlife Forensics Laboratory".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service facility in Ashland, Oregon, as the Clark R. Bavin National Fish and Wildlife Forensics Laboratory.

titles.title: To redesignate the National Fish and Wildlife Forensics Laboratory located in Ashland, Oregaon, as the "Clark R. Bavin National Fish and Wildlife Forensics Laboratory".
